name: Escape Room! (playjoa)
description:
How to play:

WASD: To move
Mouse: Move Camera
Mouse Click: Interact
Mouse Hold: Grab itens

This is my first proper atempt on making a full game experience on PC hope you guys like! 

Feedback is always good! Keep in mind that this was made in 5 days as a test. 

(SPOILERS)I

If by any means you get stuck with the puzzles here's a link to the github page where you can see the answers:

https://github.com/playjoa/Unity_EscapeRoomGame
